<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Smash from the Air](/Feats.aspx?ID=4856) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=601" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 151 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Cut from the Air](/Feats.aspx?ID=4822)

</column>

---

Your expertise enables you to knock away spells. You can use Cut from the Air against ranged spell attacks.
name: Smash from the Air
